message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $180. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is there any room for negotiation?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $180 represents my initial asking price, I'm willing to come down to $150. I'm confident you'll find this offer to be fair.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $150 is still a bit above my budget. I'm looking to get as close to $120 as possible. Can you meet me in the middle at $135?
